definition: A sudden, involuntary contraction or twitching of a specific body part, often caused by a variety of factors such as fatigue, stress, or muscle strain. It is commonly used to describe the brief, uncontrollable movement that occurs in muscles, typically visible under the skin.

examples.german: Ich hatte gestern eine Muskelzuckung in meinem Bein.
examples.english: I had a muscle twitch in my leg yesterday.

examples.german: Muskelzuckungen können durch Stress verursacht werden.
examples.english: Muscle twitches can be caused by stress.

examples.german: Die Muskelzuckung dauerte nur wenige Sekunden.
examples.english: The muscle twitch lasted only a few seconds.

examples.german: Eine Muskelzuckung kann manchmal schmerzhaft sein.
examples.english: A muscle twitch can sometimes be painful.

examples.german: Muskelzuckungen können auch durch Magnesiummangel ausgelöst werden.
examples.english: Muscle twitches can also be caused by magnesium deficiency.
